title: Aggregate data like in Excel, but easier!
text: Aggregation functions and summary rows are now available in the MUI X Premium Data Grid. Check out our blog post.

title: Date Pickers get a stable v5 release.
text: We've focused a great deal on improving the pickers, and it's finally live! Check out the blog post for more details.
